name: My Info
description:
My Info is a mini hack and slash game with a twist to the story. The game takes place in the digital world were corrupted data are threatening to take over a system. You are the only one who can stop these corrupted data from spreading further into the System. Defeat the corrupted and choose which upgrades you want. The further you go the better you will get. But there is a catch, die once and you have to restart from the start. Do you have what it takes to take down these corrupted data? Or will you end you joining them?

Controls: 

W, A, S, D - Movement

Mouse - Look around

E - Action Key

Spacebar - Dodge

Left Mouse Button - Attack
